name: @microsoft/mixed-reality-extension-altspacevr-extras
description: The Mixed Reality Extension AltspaceVR Extras package enables MRE developers to access custom AltspaceVR features.
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludeProtected --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors --disableOutputCheck --mode file --name "Mixed Reality Extension AltspaceVR Extras" --readme none --out "../../docs/altspacevr-extras" ./src
